title: Very slow Download
body: I am downloading the client at around 400kbps but when I run a speed test my download speed clears 40mbps.  I am using a mac, is there anything I can do to speed it up, or do I have to wait it out?

replies.body:
Even though your net is fast, you can run into hiccups along the way or even blocks caused by settings.  I suggest downloading the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to auto-configure your firewall settings just in case to help speed things up.  

Go over the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide as well to help tune things up for future patching updates and smooth gameplay while in a match.  I hope that helps!
